metadata.title: CVE-2024-35978 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: Fix memory leak in hci_req_sync_complete()In 'hci_req_sync_complete()', always free the previous syncrequest state before assigning reference to a new one.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
